review: people call me frankenstein
amazing game really surprised with this playability is very good and funny excellent graphics approved
hella fun
racingg
bought it on sale really fun upgrades are easy to buy for so a cheap game to buy it on sale its really worth it there are 3 game modes racing racing  killing and time attack killing
its a fun driving and combat game with different difficulty levels fun tracks cool weapons and its not hard to unlock the items and cars
game looks cool doesnt play on steam deck without really going to town changing controls refunded it
as soon as i heard its a long way to tipperary by john mccormack in the garage i knew id spent by 429 wisely
very bugged game  controls doesnt work  a lot of the questions in the discussion without answer no support from anybody
i have never played such a bad racing game in my entire gaming career this shit looks like a free asset pack mashup not fun at all

absolute lovely casual game with gaming experience in focus  old school but good school had some technical issues flickering color please turn off bloom and maybe you have to play in in window instead of full screen
xbox controller does not work at all
2023 and this is the first time i play this game
goty 2023  hands down the best pvp shooter out there
if you are a fan of games like jak x combat racing and flatout this game will be for you
1010 the ai is braindead

this game is crazy crazy violent crazy hilarious crazy fun two chunky mangled thumbs up  addendum the garage radio is fantastic carl perkins jimmie rodgers  addendum somebody put an inflatable sex doll in my car she was already inflated so 1010

the game is a lot of fun i havent lost a race yet so maybe i should up the difficulty i enjoyed flatout 2 so this game is similar but with weapons   there are 3 modes  normal race  no forward attacking weapons but can still collect items to drop behind you combat race  same as normal race but not you can use forward attacking weapons knock out  sorta like combat race but each lap the last car explodes
i was expecting generic cheapness  i got a good heaping of quality   i cant begin to tell you how good this looks on the deck w settings maxed out i need variety in my racing and this gets me full

this is basically the same game as gas guzzlers extreme its older but plays the same the only disadvantage is that it doesnt have the dlc content but the graphics look somewhat bettermore vibrant extreme looks like they just added postprocessing which made the visuals look faded and inconsistent combat carnage on the other hand looks great for its age
absolutely decadent
lgrs duke nukem voice ftw
kinda lame speed feels slow crashing feels unsatisfying as  racetracks feel uninspiring wrecks only feel good when you nitrocrash them
more than a game
get it when it is on sale quick carnage fun  a bit janky what ever made you crash you are back in the carnage quickly at least they have gone for punny names
funnyfunand affordable
a decent combat racing game
the carnagefun the racingfun how the vehicles respond to drivingfun

some nice car combat can be had here the cars handle well and the weapons are nice but some take more aiming than others they also have 3 race modes race with weapons race without weapons but you still have all the sub items mines oil smoke and last man out where each lap the last place driver blows up until theres 1 car left
no controller support
i love the smell of gasoline in the morning
i remember when i played this on disc when i was 7 and now i have it on stem good ol times
so far so good
the game is really amazing the graphics and gameplay are the best this now one one of my new fav racing games
its awesome go check it out this game has its own steam trading cards gas guzzlers extreme is the newer version of this game which also has its own cards
great game reminds me of rock and roll racing from the super nes but on acid lol
the bomb  i play with my wife and 11 year old
more fun than mario cart
play this when angry and can make you destress
it is extremely satisfying blowing shit up also a big thanks to lgr for the duke nukem voice
good game
decent fun with friends had a graphical glitch but amd disable bloom but worked in firstperson camera

impossible difficulty first race was easy overtook everyone in the second lap second race i doubt was possible couldnt get past the first corner without everyone ganging up on me survival lead to everyone getting 5 million miles ahead of me  ingame has a glitchy screen effect like its trying to be a part of the degeneration x titantron hard to tell what each pickup does mines are impossible to see and take you ouut when you have more then half of your health
